header.title: Colorized Unread Links
header.description: This MOD colorizes unread Forum/Topic/Search Result/Private Message/MCP Topics Links.
header.author-notes: This version now supports colorize subforums and for the great contribution in the development of version 1.1.1, I leave a big thanks to phpBB community members Neo and Raimon.

action-group.diy-instructions: 1. Run cl_install.php 2. Purge the cache and refresh the template. 3. Set the settings for the "Colorized Unread Links" under the ".MODS" tab.
